reviewText: This movie is actually hard core porn with oral, vaginal, and anal sex. It has seven scenes about 20 minutes each.  I bought it thinking it was girls stripping like in the "Peach" videos.  Hard to believe [...] sells hard core porn...
Totally different from what I thought it would be.  Really not impresses. Just an OK movie
Use it as part of a therapy group for Veterans- they have given it a thumbs up.
An interesting portrayal of the dangers of addiction in the young.
Kept me engrossed....not a 'block-buster' but a good movie that is a 'free' rental.
I did not mean to order this ~ we had typed in 'Orange is the New Black', & this was the option.  We thought 'Addiction' was the name for the pilot episode.

I really love this movie... Excellent work to all the team!!!
It is a film to see and review. Production is very good, shots, makeup... are successful.

The cover is (and is not) indicative of what going on in this effort.  The main character is sort of an everyman, a working stiff.  Through a chance encounter, he dispatches a would-be mugger.  Though revolting to him, he experiences a rush that he's never known.  More importantly, wants to experience that rush...again and again.

Addiction: For one man - a needle - for another man a knife.

Low budget, but the message is clear.

I rate addiction...3 stars!

From the picture on the cover, you would assume that the main character is suffering from drug addiction.  My fault that I did not read the description thoroughly, but this film was of very poor quality.
